data.text:
Starting today is the summer training camp- The training camp 
menu and points to remember are written in a memo that I'm having 
Sakura Chiyono O look over.
data.processed:
󠁿Starting today is the summer training camp- The training camp 
󠁿menu and points to remember are written in a memo that I'm having

data.text:
Hmm hmm… As expected of Summer Training 
Camp, it's jam packed with things to do!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: There's more exercise than normal, will you be okay?
choices.processed: <size=31>There's more exercise than normal, will you be okay?</size>

choices.text: There's more exercise than normal, will you be okay?

data.text:
Of course! 
I believe in Trainer-san and this [Trainote]!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: [Trainote]?

data.processed:
󠁿Of course! 
󠁿I believe in Trainer-san and this [Trainote]!

data.text:
Yes! The things I need to get better at, things I can do to 
increase my abilities… it's all written down in this note!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Yes! The things I need to get better at, things I can do to 
󠁿increase my abilities… it's all written down in this note!

data.text:
I'm sure, you've read those books you bought before, 
and taken the time to think up this menu for me…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿I'm sure, you've read those books you bought before, 
󠁿and taken the time to think up this menu for me…

data.text:
That's why, this book filled with 
Trainer-san's feelings is the [Trainote]!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, this book filled with 
󠁿Trainer-san's feelings is the [Trainote]!

data.text:
…During this training camp, I'll show you that even if it's 
just a little bit, I'll grow stronger…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿…During this training camp, I'll show you that even if it's 
󠁿just a little bit, I'll grow stronger…!

data.text:
Sakura Chiyono O's eyes burned 
with a fierce fighting spirit.
data.processed:
󠁿Sakura Chiyono O's eyes burned 
󠁿with a fierce fighting spirit.

data.text:
…puha! 
It's just a little further, to the shore…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿…puha! 
󠁿It's just a little further, to the shore…!

data.text:
Not yet! 10 sets remaining…! 
[Chiyo walks, Gate In]…!!!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Not yet! 10 sets remaining…! 
󠁿[Chiyo walks, Gate In]…!!!

data.text:
Hey, since we got to training camp, 
doesn't it seem like Chiyo-chan has gotten pretty intense?
data.name: Fellow Camp Horsegirl A
data.processed:
󠁿Hey, since we got to training camp, 
󠁿doesn't it seem like Chiyo-chan has gotten pretty intense?

data.text:
Yeah, she's putting in a crazy amount of effort. 
…but both of us, won't lose to her, right?!
data.name: Fellow Camp Horsegirl B
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, she's putting in a crazy amount of effort. 
󠁿…but both of us, won't lose to her, right?!

data.text:
Haa, haa… 
Today's menu, is finished~!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Haa, haa… 
󠁿Today's menu, is finished~!

data.text:
On the way here, it felt like there were alot of 
people around… Am I… doing something weird?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: No, you're [The Usual] Chiyono.

data.processed:
󠁿On the way here, it felt like there were alot of 
󠁿people around… Am I… doing something weird?

Okay…? 
Well if that's the case, then it's fine…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Okay…? 
󠁿Well if that's the case, then it's fine…

data.text:
After that, she spent the next few days doing nothing 
but training- before we knew it, the last day of 
summer training camp was approaching.
data.processed:
󠁿After that, she spent the next few days doing nothing 
󠁿but training- before we knew it, the last day of 
󠁿summer training camp was approaching.

Just a little bit… really just a tiny bit but, I…!

data.text: And so the Summer Training Camp came to a close. And then-
data.processed: 󠁿And so the Summer Training Camp came to a close. And then-

data.text:
So they were holding a festival this close by, huh~. 
Thank you very much for bringing me along!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: It's a reward for working so hard during camp

Cotton Candy, Yo-yos, Goldfish scooping- Ah!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
󠁿Ehehe. Then, I'm going to enjoy it to the fullest!

data.text:
This puppy plushie, looks alot like Maruzen-san don't you think? 
Like this fluffiness and these kind-looking eyes!

It's so cute~…!

Wait, no no no! Nevermind!

data.text:
Hey you two, are you interested in this plushie? 
In that case how about some [mould-cutting]!?

data.processed:
󠁿Hey you two, are you interested in this plushie? 
󠁿In that case how about some [mould-cutting]!?

data.text: Mould-cutting…?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: 󠁿Mould-cutting…?

data.text:
Mould-cutting is taking this square made of sugar, 
and using your fingers and this needle to shave 
and cut out this shape in the middle!
data.name: Stallkeeper
data.processed:
󠁿Mould-cutting is taking this square made of sugar, 
󠁿and using your fingers and this needle to shave 
󠁿and cut out this shape in the middle!

present! How's that? Want to try it out?

data.processed:

data.text:
You said it before right? That watching me gives you strength, 
and watching me work hard gives you courage.

󠁿You said it before right? That watching me gives you strength, 
󠁿and watching me work hard gives you courage.

data.processed:

data.processed:
